name: Transform Other Aura
effect: The mage can alter another's aura, changing the appearance of his true nature just as he does for himself with Prime 2.

rotes.roteDescription: A Free Council mage who intends to masquerade as a Sleeper -- or even a vampire or werewolf -- might want others of his "kind" nearby to back him up in case of trouble. With this rote, he can make his entire cabal look to be something its members are not, at least to the eyes of those who can read auras.
